common_cold.description: Although it's fast, the common cold doesn't pose much of a threat due to its low HP.

coronavirus.description: This devil may be slow, but its high health makes it a force to be reckoned with.

hepatitis_a.description: A very average virus. Has medium health and moves at medium speed.

hepatitis_b.description: Bulkier than their purple cousins, Hepatitis B has a shield to better survive the immune system.

hiv.description: HIV is not only difficult to kill, but it also destroys nearby towers on death. Stay sharp!

polio.description: The polio virus is weak, but it can fly over cells and go straight to the goal.

rabies.description: Danger! This virus moves quickly and explodes when it dies, destroying any nearby towers!

smallpox.description: This virus would be weak if not for its regenerating shield.
